node.title: Seeking participation with the TFT plan

node.title: Why ThreeFold chose Stellar
node.excerpt: At ThreeFold, together with a beautiful ecosystem of partners, we are co-creating a peer-to-peer Internet that empowers equality, freedom, and sustainability.

node.title: Decentralizing the Internet
node.excerpt: In this article, we discuss the general concept of a decentralized grid and how anyone can plug-in capacity to the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: An escape from the Great Hack
node.excerpt: I cant help but think how unfair it is that in todays digital society, people are being treated like products, because there is no such thing as a free platform without YOU being the product.

node.title: A better solution for our planet
node.excerpt: We believe IT can be sustainable. Actually, it should be! That's why energy efficiency has always been a key focus of ours..

node.title: We need a more inclusive internet
node.excerpt: Today we are working with partners in the clean energy and network / connectivity to build the solutions that are needed to provide fair and uninterrupted internet access with all corners of the world.

node.title: The need for ThreeFold's neutral internet
node.excerpt: The Internet is no longer the neutral place it used to be. +80% of the Internet capacity is delivered by a handful of companies.

node.title: Why Anyone Should Consider Becoming A (ThreeFold) Farmer

node.title: You Are Unique
node.excerpt: During a gathering with some friends, I noticed something that made me think about how important it is what were doing.
